channel.title: [PI] Miasmic Barrage
channel.description:
Hey guys, currently i've been stumped and frustrated on how to add the "miasmic barrage" spell i con into the spell book. I don't understand how people automatically know the coords of where the picture will go. can someone help me out?
P.s. I need something like this! [img]http://s15.postimg.org/7zrw43jnf/Untitled.png[/img]
